/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a sweeping view of the cityscape below. The street, lined with power lines and telephone poles, stretches out into the distance, disappearing into the horizon. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is captured from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the view.
